numericalExperiment.rationale: Ensembles of 30-year hindcasts and predictions. Assess model skill in forecasting climate change on time-scales when the initial climate may exert some influence.
numericalExperiment.description: Extend to 30 years the experiment 1.1 integration with initial date in 1980. A minimum ensemble size of 3 should be produced.

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.ic.oc
numericalRequirement.description: Ocean Initial Conditions must represent in some measure the observed anomolies for the start date used

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.ic.1980
numericalRequirement.description: Simulations should be initialised towards the end of 1980

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.ant_wmg
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of well mixed gases (anthropogenic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.volc_wmg
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of well mixed gases (volcanic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.sls
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.nat_aer
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of aerosols (natural)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.ant_aer
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of aerosols (anthropogenic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.nat_aer_prec
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of aerosol (natural) precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.ant_aer_prec
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of aerosol (anthropogenic) precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.solar
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing solar forcing

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.LU
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing land use

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.NoVolc2005
numericalRequirement.description: No volcanic aerosol emissions beyond 2005

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.seaice
numericalRequirement.description: Sea ice observations forcing (unless modelled) must precede start date of simulation

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.wmg
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.sls
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.aer
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.aer_pre
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.LU
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing RCP4.5 land use

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.bc.volc_aer_conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed constant background volcanic aerosol may (or may not) be specified

numericalRequirement.name: 1.2.stc.1980_30yr
numericalRequirement.description: Begin in 1980 and run for 30 years
